text.text: Here are the files in the *`aws_chalice`* directory:

‣ *`app.py`* (1.7 KB) - Main application file
‣ *`simple_app.py`* (1.6 KB) - Simple example app
‣ *`oauth_app.py`* (1.9 KB) - OAuth-enabled app example
‣ *`requirements.txt`* (9 bytes) - Python dependencies
‣ *`deploy.sh`* (252 bytes, executable) - Deployment script
‣ *`.gitignore`* (84 bytes) - Git ignore rules

‣ *`config.json.oauth`* (573 bytes) - Chalice config for OAuth app
‣ *`config.json.simple`* (368 bytes) - Chalice config for simple app
*Total*: 6 main files + 2 config files in the `.chalice/` directory
These files demonstrate how to deploy a Slack Bolt app using AWS Chalice (a Python serverless microframework for AWS Lambda).
